topic: TS API Data Fetcher Bot Error
type: TS API Data Fetcher Bot Error - Reference Parent Missing

definition.text: The node where this error occured needs to have a Reference Parent. Establish a reference from this node and this error will not happen again.

paragraphs.text: In the following section, you will find the information recorded when the error occurred.
You will only see the information if you opened this page as a result of the error actually occurring.
